newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Atel - business as expected so far in 97.
newsitem.headline: Atel - business as expected so far in 97.

text.p: Swiss electrical utility Aare-Tessin AG fuer Elektrizitaet said in its annual report that business was developing in line with expectations this year but that competition was increasing.
"For the current business year, Atel expects no basic changes in the tougher economic environment, but a further accentuation of competition and pressure on margins," it said.
"Increased efforts on the revenue as well as the costs side are necessary. The current business year is developing as expected," it said.
